bibl.title: Papyri from Hermopolis and other Documents of the Byzantine Period.

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Rees B.R. (edited with translations and notes), Papyri from Hermopolis and other Documents of the Byzantine Period. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 42.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1964, xii-127 pp. et VI pll.

C.R. par Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 44 (1964) p. 342. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 40 (1965) No. 80, pp. 473-482. - José O'Callaghan, StPap 5 (1966) pp. 85-87. - John R. Rea, CR N.S., 16 (1966) pp. 42-45. - Peter J. Parsons, JHS 86 (1966) pp. 218-219. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 83 (1966) pp. 408-417. - Naphtali Lewis, AJP 88 (1967) pp. 105-108.
